Question
========

A person achieves a score of 11 good on a Statistics test. The mean score of all participants in the test is 14.1 with a standard deviation 0.5. The z-score of the person with 11 correct is then equal to

Answerlist
----------

* -7.65
* -7.1
* -6.2

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 7.65: Incorrect
* 7.1: Incorrect
* 6.2: Correct
